effect.diamond_pearl: Raises user’s Defense by one stage. After this move is used, the power of ice ball and rollout are doubled until the user leaves the field.
effect.platinum: Raises user’s Defense by one stage. After this move is used, the power of ice ball and rollout are doubled until the user leaves the field.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Raises user’s Defense by one stage. After this move is used, the power of ice ball and rollout are doubled until the user leaves the field.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.
